summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1615, for the improvement of North and West Sixtieth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Phinney Avenue, by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks, together with all necessary appurtenances in accordance with plans prepared by the City Engineer, under Ordinance No. 17178, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
